name: Tetris Clone
description:
Featured on Phaser official site: http://phaser.io/news/2017/07/tetris-clone/


Left Arrow Key: moves piece left

Right Arrow Key: moves piece right

soft drop: Down Arrow Key

hard drop: Space Bar

hold piece: X key

rotate clockwise: Up Arrow Key

rotate counter clockwise: Z key

Source code available at https://bitbucket.org/CaioMGA/phaser-tetris/overview
